mapper.sql: InfRecType, EntName, EntCertType, EntCertNum, RptDate, SheetYear, SheetType, SheetTypeDivide, AuditFirmName, AuditorName, AuditTime, Cimoc, RptDateCode, TotalLiabilitiesAndNetAssets

sql.if: AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM S_ORG_INFO S WHERE T1.BR_NO=S.BR_NO START WITH S.BR_NO=#{br_no} CONNECT BY PRIOR S.BR_NO = S.UP_ONE)

mapper.select: SELECT FROM EB_FINAINSBAL_INFO T1 WHERE T1.INFRECTYPE = '640'
mapper.update: UPDATE EB_FINAINSBAL_INFO T1 SET T1.PAGENUMBER = ROWNUM WHERE T1.RPT_TYPE = '1' AND T1.CHECK_STS = '1' AND T1.INFRECTYPE = '640'
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(T1.PAGENUMBER) FROM EB_FINAINSBAL_INFO T1 WHERE T1.RPT_TYPE = '1' AND T1.CHECK_STS = '1' AND T1.INFRECTYPE = '640'
mapper.update: UPDATE EB_FINAINSBAL_INFO T1 SET T1.CHECK_STS = '1' WHERE T1.RPT_TYPE = '1' AND T1.INFRECTYPE = '640'
mapper.delete:
DELETE V_ERROR_INFO B WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM EB_FINAINSBAL_INFO T1 WHERE B.RECORD_ID = T1.RECORD_ID AND T1.RPT_TYPE = '1' AND T1.INFRECTYPE = '640'
)
